I am proud to have @UFWupdates endorsement as I seek re-election in the new CA18. I look forward to the campaign & to fighting with farm workers & others for fairness, worker protections, & our true American values. https://t.co/VBwIfJK4UT

It also includes cities & communities in San Benito & Monterey counties all the way to the San Luis Obispo County line. I look forward to meeting new families & entrepreneurs, as well as the chance to represent many farmworkers I've had the pleasure to work with before. (4/4)
The district will continue through my current district in Morgan Hill, San Martin & Gilroy, & expand to include more of the Gilroy community I've gotten to know over the years. (3/4)

CA-18 will include my home in downtown San Jose continuing into East San Jose (which I‚Äôve been honored to represent for many years) & run past the Anderson Dam (which we're retrofitting for public safety). (2/4)

Now that we know the final results from the California Citizens Redistricting Commission's work, it is my honor & privilege to announce that I'm running for re-election in 2022 in the newly-drawn CA-18. (1/4)
